docs.text: Dietrich Bollmann, PhD Welcome, I am an independent Computer Scientist and Computational Linguist specializing in the application of Artificial Intelligence and Artificial Neural Networks ( Deep Learning ) to language , music , images , and design . For more detailled information please have a look on my github and project pages . I enjoy life and work in an international environment and studied, worked and lived in Germany, Japan, France, and Italy.
